TITLE: the basics.
BODY: drag pieces together to make cubes.

TITLE: the rule.
BODY:
all the sides of a cube must be the same 
or all the sides must be different.

TITLE: fixed orientation.
BODY:
the orientation of sides cannot be 
changed.

TITLE: "all same or all different."
BODY: that's all there is to it!

TITLE: break it up
BODY:
you can double-tap a group of two to 
break it apart. 

use the reset button to start all over.

TITLE: oranges are not the only fruit
BODY:
color is not the only trait. 

this is pattern.

TITLE: two traits one piece.
BODY:
each trait on each piece must obey the 
all same or all different rule

TITLE: noise reduction.
BODY:
not every trait is visual. 

touch a piece and listen to the sound it 
makes.

TITLE: hit.
BODY:
you can press the "hit me" button to get 
more pieces.

TITLE: how moving.
BODY:
this is the animation trait. 

it's probably easier than sound was.

TITLE: particle-ular.
BODY:
this is the particle trait. 

in 2002 this feature alone would have 
driven sales.

TITLE: triple trouble.
BODY:
we're too classy to make a three-way 
joke.

TITLE: four!
BODY: just when you had three traits mastered.
